verses.text:
I'M glad I ever heard the cry,
We'll all rise together in the morning;
My Saviour's coming from the sky,
We'll all rise together in the morning.

A righteous crown we soon shall wear,
We'll all rise together in the morning;
It will outshine the morning star,
We'll all rise together in the morning.

The blessed Saviour then will come,
We'll all rise together in the morning;
To take his holy people home,
We'll all rise together in the morning.

You'll see him coming in a cloud,
We'll all rise together in the morning;
Then all the saints will shout aloud,
We'll all rise together in the morning.

O, glorious hopeâ€”O, blest abode,
We'll all rise together in the morning;
I shall be there, and like my Lord,
We'll all rise together in the morning.

chorus.text:
In the morning, resurrection morning,
We'll all rise together in the morning.
